= Page Layout =
You can have a [http://www.noobcube.com/tutorials/html-css/fixed-header-footer-layout-a-beginners-guide-/ fixed header using just HTML and CSS] in GWT using [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/doc/latest/DevGuideUiPanels.html#BasicPanels RootPanel]. As we're aiming for a "full page" app, let's use [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/doc/latest/DevGuideUiPanels.html#LayoutPanels LayoutPanels]. 

[GettingStarted Download the template project] and run
{{{
createProject.sh org.gwtgaebook.CultureShows
}}}
then do File > Import > Existing Projects from Eclipse. Run it to make sure it's working.

= Exercise =
Open !LandingView.ui.xml in client.landing package and try to implement the [VisualizingYourApp mocked up UI]. No need to implement View java logic yet, just focus on widgets and styling.
